title: Fuck You In Particular

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Kill your target. 1 use, resolves immediately.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, one random player is assigned to be your target. This **can** be a teammate, or even yourself.
- If your target dies to anything that isn't from a Mafia member, switch targets.
- If you are your own target and you kill yourself with your ability, you get 20 brownie points.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who would oppose the Mafia.

desc:
Post 5488
*Yeah, I really hate that guy.*
